turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Implementation maturity model assessment.
turn.1: What is the difference between the ILMM and other maturity models?
turn.2: The maturity levels belonging to the elements can be found in the cells below the timeline.
turn.3: Are there specific dates associated with the beginning of the ILMM?
turn.4: This timeline does not hold any temporal meaning.
turn.5: Why is the ILMM designed to be more sensitive to changes in the business environment?
turn.6: It merely allows the matrix to depict empty cells between the different levels.
turn.7: What do you find most interesting about the ILMM?
turn.8: Although these empty cells don’t have particular meanings, they do illustrate the dependencies between elements and their maturity levels.
turn.9: Is there a way to view the ILMM as a visual chart?
turn.10: Due to these dependencies and checkpoints, even if an element has almost achieved, for instance, maturity level B, it will still be assigned to level A.
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: The maturity level of each implementation factor can be derived from the maturities of the elements it comprises.
